EmailTemplate.name: Global_Content Syndication_PCFtheAuditorsGuide_WP_Q417.Download Confirmation
EmailTemplate.subject: Thanks for downloading the Pivotal Cloud Foundry: the Auditor’s Guide white paper
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Thank you for downloading Pivotal Cloud Foundry: the Auditor’s Guide white paper. We hope you find it informative and helpful as you investigate technology options for your cloud-native journey.
Given your interest in this white paper, we thought you might also find these resources of use <[[https://content.pivotal.io/thank-you-for-downloading-pivotal-cloud-foundry-the-auditors-guide]]>.
If you would like more information, or have any questions about how Pivotal can assist your organization on its cloud-native journey, don’t hesitate to reach out by contacting us here <[[https://pivotal.io/contact]]>. Thank you,The Pivotal Team
